headline: What RTX (RTX)'s New Defense and Autonomy Wins Mean for Shareholders
summary: In recent weeks, RTX businesses secured U.S. defense milestones, including Navy approval of Raytheon’s StormBreaker smart weapon for F/A-18E/F Super Hornets and successful Collins Aerospace flight tests of autonomous mission software for the Air Force’s Collaborative Combat Aircraft program. Together with new work on thin-film lithium niobate wafers for secure photonics, these advances highlight RTX’s deepening role in high-end weapons, autonomy, and next‑generation communications for both...
